segments.text: Vince , I think one of your programmers is spying on us for WebTracker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I won't say who , because I'm not sure yet . But I'll know soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Zina , I hope you're not scheming to make Elvin look bad .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dave then ? Dave is a spy for WebTracker ? You can't be serious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Loan me that tape recorder you have . And don't say anything to anyone until I come back .
segments.speaker: S1
